name: Bouncy Smash (itch)
description:
Bouncy Smash is a 4-player free for all platform fighter game where the objective is to pick up and throw your opponents into the moving portal at the edge of the screen. It is set in a cute neighbourhood where kids are ruling the streets and an ominous purple vortex has appeared in the sky. The characters are a-symmetric and so have different properties and styles of play. 

Made to be used with Xbox controllers.

X = Pick up and Throw.

A = Jump.
